prescription.title: Medi Mate will analyze and explain {{name}}'s prescription for you!

titleParts.part1: Medi Mate will analyze and explain

steps.step1: Please prepare the prescription you received from the hospital.
steps.step2: Move to an environment with good lighting.
steps.step3:
To ensure all parts of the prescription are clearly visible,
lay it flat and take the photo.
steps.step4: Please add the captured image or file.
steps.step5:
When Medi Mate scans your prescription,
we will explain the medications based on the analysis.
steps.details: (Prescription name, efficacy, usage, precautions, interactions, side effects, storage methods, etc.)

upload.description: Please add your prescription image here.
upload.file_type_error: Only JPEG and PNG files are supported.
